alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 1:10PM MDT until October 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick, snow covered, and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult including US-14 across the Bighorn mountains.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
